ModMetaData.name: Terraform Live
ModMetaData.author: Vovik
ModMetaData.description:
This is a terraforming mod to provide in-game live natural landscape changes.
Built-in functionality: dynamic map tile changes > ice freezing and thawing > marsh spreading/drying > ocean water flux and reflux > tile moistening near moist places > water flux and reflux on rain events > water flux and reflux on hot events > mushroom spreading > lichen spreading > lichen tile transforming to lichen plant > lichen plant (harvestable)
Future plans: - man-made tile reoccupation by nature - ivy on walls - partial ivy wall destruction - future destruction prevention - structure destruction from temperature deviations
